data.name: Face Your Demons
data.detailed_description:
A short jumpscare experience, based on a demon encounter in a haunted cathedral.

- Total duration: about two minutes of linear experience;

- Gaze-based menu, no need for controllers;

- Great for first-time VR users - especially family and friends - and for those who enjoy a dark mood and ambiance.

data.short_description: A short Jumpscare experience, based on a demon encounter in a haunted cathedral. Great for first-time VR users, especially family and friends or for those who enjoy a dark mood and ambiance.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: IntelÂ® i7 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Power Plan under Windows Power Options be set to "High performance" or equivalent

movies.name: In Engine Trailer - Face Your Demons

content_descriptors.notes: This experience is not recommended for those who are easily impressionable or suffer from epilepsy, as it contains scary scenes and intermittent lights
